languages.text: "Домин'{name}, коль желаешь впустить еретичку в свиту свою, то позволь вырезать на ее языке обет служения. Боль помешает молвить ложь и напомнит о покорности".

"Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}, коль желаешь впустить еретичку в свиту свою, то позволь вырезать на ее языке обет служения. Боль помешает молвить ложь и напомнит о покорности".

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

"Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

languages.text: «Domin'{name}, si de verdad quiere aceptar a esta hereje en su séquito, permita que talle un juramento de servicio en su lengua. El dolor evitará que engañe a nadie y le recordará la obediencia que debe».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}, si de verdad quiere aceptar a esta hereje en su séquito, permita que talle un juramento de servicio en su lengua. El dolor evitará que engañe a nadie y le recordará la obediencia que debe».

languages.text: 「ドミン{name}、この異端者をあなたの従者に加えることが望みであるのなら、彼女の舌に奉仕の誓いを刻むことをお許しください。その痛みで彼女が欺瞞の言葉を口にするのを防ぎ、服従を思い起こさせるのです」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン{name}、この異端者をあなたの従者に加えることが望みであるのなら、彼女の舌に奉仕の誓いを刻むことをお許しください。その痛みで彼女が欺瞞の言葉を口にするのを防ぎ、服従を思い起こさせるのです」

languages.text: “秘者{name}，如果你真的打算让这个异端分子成为你的随行人员，请允许我在她的舌头上刻下效忠的誓言，让痛苦阻止她说出任何欺骗性的话语，时刻提醒她服从命令。”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}，如果你真的打算让这个异端分子成为你的随行人员，请允许我在她的舌头上刻下效忠的誓言，让痛苦阻止她说出任何欺骗性的话语，时刻提醒她服从命令。”

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, falls Ihr diese Ketzerin wirklich in Euer Gefolge aufnehmen wollt, dann erlaubt mir, einen Dienstschwur in ihre Zunge zu schneiden. Der Schmerz wird sie von betrügerischen Worten abhalten und an ihren Gehorsam erinnern."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, falls Ihr diese Ketzerin wirklich in Euer Gefolge aufnehmen wollt, dann erlaubt mir, einen Dienstschwur in ihre Zunge zu schneiden. Der Schmerz wird sie von betrügerischen Worten abhalten und an ihren Gehorsam erinnern."

languages.text: « Domin'{name}, si vous voulez vraiment accueillir cette hérétique dans votre entourage, permettez-moi au moins de graver un vœu de service sur sa langue. La douleur l'empêchera de proférer des propos mensongers et lui rappellera son devoir d'obéissance. »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."

traits.locale_text: « Domin'{name}, si vous voulez vraiment accueillir cette hérétique dans votre entourage, permettez-moi au moins de graver un vœu de service sur sa langue. La douleur l'empêchera de proférer des propos mensongers et lui rappellera son devoir d'obéissance. »

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, eğer ki bu kâfiri hakikaten maiyetine katmak niyetindeysen müsaadenle diline bir hizmet yemini kazıyayım. Acı, hilekâr sözler söylemesine engel olup ona itaatkârlığı hatırlatsın."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, if it is indeed your wish to let this heretic into your retinue, then allow me to carve a vow of service into her tongue. Let the pain prevent her from uttering words of deceit and remind her of obedience."
